job.title: ServiceNow Developer
job.description: We are currently accepting resumes for a ServiceNow/ATF Developer in Columbus, OH.Required Skills and Experience:- Bachelor’s degree in computer science, management information science, or related field6-8 years’ experience ServiceNow Developer skillset: Flow designer, Service Portal,CSMATF Developer - all the above plus ATFMust have a strong CSM and Service Portal skillsetServiceNow Contractor with Specialty experience with Customer Service Mgmt (CSM Module).Experience and knowledge of CSM and how it interacts with platform modulesAngular, JavascriptCSMCSM Portal (external and internal)Agent WorkspaceMajor CaseNatural LanguageCustomer MobileService Catalog/Service RequestUNICON International, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer.If you are interested in working for an organization where honesty, integrity and quality are among the core principles then click apply today!Keywords: ServiceNow, ATF, CSM, Angular, Javascript, Agent Workspace, Major Case, Natural Language, Customer Mobile, Service Catalog/Service Request
